name: Watch Out
overview: Dodge City never saw a meaner, sneakier varmint than Cockeyed Frank Loving! Why, he chased Wyatt Earp outta town so fast his horse was still tied to the hitch'n post while it was runnin'! And 'cuz you weren't around to object, folks elected YOU sheriff in Wyatt's place! Now Cockeyed Frank is after you.
